analysis.description:
MasterDeposit.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#392-419) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- erc20Balance == 0

ChildDeposit.withdraw (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#142-152) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(_tokenAddress).transfer(_destination,_value) (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#146-152)

MasterDeposit.transferTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- erc20Balance = ERC20(_tokenContractAddress).balanceOf(deposit) (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#398-399)

MasterDeposit.transferTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- ChildDeposit(deposit).withdraw(_tokenContractAddress,coldWallet1Share,coldWallet1) (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#410-415)

MasterDeposit.transferTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- ChildDeposit(deposit).withdraw(_tokenContractAddress,coldWallet2Share,coldWallet2) (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#415-419)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_tokenAddress' of ChildDeposit.withdraw (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#143-145) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of ChildDeposit.withdraw (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#145-146) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_destination' of ChildDeposit.withdraw (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#146) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of MasterDeposit.fireDepositToChildEvent (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#371-372) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_wallet1' of MasterDeposit.MasterDeposit (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#320) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_wallet2' of MasterDeposit.MasterDeposit (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#320) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_percentage' of MasterDeposit.MasterDeposit (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#320-321) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_count' of MasterDeposit.createChildDeposits (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#332) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_depositCreator' of MasterDeposit.addDepositCreator (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#343-344) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_depositCreator' of MasterDeposit.removeDepositCreator (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#350) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_percentage' of MasterDeposit.setColdWallet1SplitPercentage (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#359) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_coldWallet1' of MasterDeposit.setColdWallet1 (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#379) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_coldWallet2' of MasterDeposit.setColdWallet2 (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#381) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_deposits' of MasterDeposit.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#392-394) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenContractAddress' of MasterDeposit.transferTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0xc2ee4954ea6e5164fa4ab8af4d326f6398c23299.sol#394-395) is not in mixedCase
